entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
